definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Fireflies use their light for attracting mates.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲用它們的光亮來吸引異性。

sentences.english: Firebug makes it simple to find HTML elements buried deep in the page.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲變得非常簡單找到HTML元素深埋在該網頁。

sentences.english: Then I released the shutter and set the firefly free.
sentences.chinese: 然後我關掉快門，把螢火蟲放走了。

sentences.english: We are all worms , but I do believe I am a glowworm.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是小蟲子，但我相信我是一隻螢火蟲。

sentences.english: The larva takes aim at the snail's tentacles. It strikes with its poison nippers.
sentences.chinese: 小螢火蟲瞄準了蝸牛的觸角，並用自己帶毒的螯出擊。

sentences.english: Fireflies give off flashes of light when they fly at night.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲夜間飛行時發出閃光。

sentences.english: The glowworms light the stars all over the sky in the night without moon.
sentences.chinese: 沒有月色的夜裏，螢火蟲用心點亮漫天的星。

sentences.english: Microcosmos is published by Firefly Books later this month.
sentences.chinese: 《微觀世界》由螢火蟲出版社於本月末出版。

sentences.english: Firebug breaks it all down for you file-by-file.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲下來休息，這一切爲您的文件的文件。

sentences.english: I lean against the railing, staring at the firefly.
sentences.chinese: 我憑依欄杆，細看那螢火蟲。

sentences.english: Wasn't it easier in your firefly-catchin' days?
sentences.chinese: 在你捉螢火蟲時的日子是否更容易過？

sentences.english: These fireflies even twinkled with their friends of the same kind at the neighboring tree, singing in chorus.
sentences.chinese: 這些螢火蟲也照亮了附近的樹木，齊聲高唱。

sentences.english: Fireflies love moisture and often live in humid regions of Asia and the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲喜溼，常分佈在亞洲和美洲的溼潤地區。

sentences.english: They were a head of a herring, a tree fragment and a firefly.
sentences.chinese: 說話的是一個鯡魚頭，一段喬木片和一隻螢火蟲。

sentences.english: Glow-worm larvae - and these larvae hunt snails.
sentences.chinese: 螢火蟲的幼蟲，和它們愛喫的蝸牛。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
to come and go/to roam about (mostly unseen)/(of a ghost) to haunt (a place)/(of a criminal) to stalk (the streets)/(of the sun) to rise and set
